title: FS/FT:  Some Big Name HOFers PSAs for sale or possibly trade
author: bounce

posts.post_title: FS/FT:  Some Big Name HOFers PSAs for sale or possibly trade
posts.post_content:
Have some extras I'd like to move out, either sell or trade for something I need.  I can send pics of the backs, please just ask.

I also have the back pictures in my eBay listings, same name there (bounce).  If you're interested, please reach out to me here - I can make much better deals here than I can there.

I like to negotiate, so please don't be shy.  I definitely prefer to trade, these are some things I'd be interested in if proposing to trade:
A)  Any T206 HOF portraits PSA 4 ONLY
B)  1914 Cracker Jack HOFers any grade
C)  T205 Johnson, Mathewson, Cobb and Young PSA 3 or better
D)  1933 Goudey Ruth PSA 3 or better, any pose
E)  1948 Leaf Ruth, Robinson and Musial PSA 4 or better
F)  1950s Topps HOF RCs PSA 4 or better

Prices below are delivered via PP F&F, otherwise add 3% fee for regular PP.

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url].

Thanks


Bresnahan Piedmont PSA 5.5 - $600 OBO - TRADED

And some others
bump - prefer to sell but i will trade if it's something interesting - let me know

David:

I had offered $1,250 for the above card on ebay last week and you declined it. I see you have it listed here for $1,450 OBO. What is the best price for immediate payment by paypal F/F?

Thanks for the consideration.

Bill

Dave great speaking and dealing with you and as mentioned received the cards yesterday.  Couldn't be happier (the Johnson Sovereign is awesome), a fair deal for both of us I thought.  Good luck with the rest of your sales.
